mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.title, r.content, r.store_name, r.region, r.member_id FROM review r LEFT JOIN receipt_image ri ON r.review_id = ri.review_id LEFT JOIN review_image ri2 ON r.review_id = ri2.review_id LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (title, content, store_name, region, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{storeName}, #{region}, #{memberId})
